GENERIC.ERROR_LABEL: There was an error processing your request. Please try again later.

VALIDATION.MIN_LENGTH: This field has to be at least {minLength} characters long.
VALIDATION.MAX_LENGTH: This field has to be maximum {maxLength} characters long.
VALIDATION.VERIFY_PASSWORD: Verify password must match the password.

IP_ADDRESS.ILLEGAL: This IP address is from a disallowed range.

ERRORS.USERNAME_TAKEN: This username was already taken by another user.
ERRORS.EMAIL_TAKEN: This email was already taken by another user.
ERRORS.CREDENTIALS_WRONG: Provided username or password is not correct.

CHANGE_DIALOG.TITLE: Change language
CHANGE_DIALOG.DESCRIPTION: Choose language to use in application. This change should be reflected almost instantly.

PROJECTS.LIST_EMPTY: There are no projects available! You can create one by clicking "Create project" button.

ORACLE.LABEL: Oracle Database Connection Properties
ORACLE.HOST_HINT: Host must be a valid IPv4 or IPv6 address.

CONNECTION_ERROR.CONNECTION_FAILURE: There was an error trying to connect to the project database.
CONNECTION_ERROR.TIMEOUT: Connection to project database has timed out.
CONNECTION_ERROR.INTEGRITY_VIOLATION: The operation could not be completed due to a violation of database integrity rules.
CONNECTION_ERROR.PERMISSION_DENIED: Project database user does not have the required permissions.
CONNECTION_ERROR.UNKNOWN: An unknown error occurred while trying to connect to the project database.

PROJECTS.DELETE_CONFIRM_DESCRIPTION: Are you sure you want to delete this project? This is irreversible!

COLLABORATORS.LABEL: Collaborators
COLLABORATORS.ADD_DESCRIPTION: Add collaborator to grant access to project to a specific user.
COLLABORATORS.ALREADY_COLLABORATOR_ERROR: This user is already a collaborator.
COLLABORATORS.USER_NOT_EXISTS_ERROR: The provided user does not exist.
COLLABORATORS.CHANGE_ROLE_DESCRIPTION: Change role of an existing collaborator.
COLLABORATORS.DELETE_DESCRIPTION: Are you sure you want to remove this collaborator?

TABLES.LABEL: Table
